author: mcconnell
msg: Build and javadoc updates together with reference updates to Excalibur i18n 1.1

author: leosimons
msg: Materials which are not specifically about sofware, but more part of the main site that have been moved to jakarta-avalon-site/src/.

author: mcconnell
msg: Removed extra character in schema.xml filter.

author: leosimons
msg: The excalibur site right now is built using a variety of tools, including our own
custom cocoon installed by Nicola and good ol' anakia. One thing that's pretty annoying
about this setup is that it generates lots of images/ and skin/ directories all containing
the same file. I've fixed this by hand by replacing the relative paths with absolute
paths, and by removing all images/ and skin/ directories manually. As such, these documents
are usuable on avalon.apache.org only, and not for local browsing.
